title: We Heard You. We’re Changing the Commenting System.
text:
After rolling out the new commenting system for HotAir recently, and after receiving all of your much-needed, honest feedback on the Spot.IM commenting system, HotAir is making a change. The Townhall Media family is going to Disqus.

Instead of going back to Facebook comments which you all despised, we are going to a new platform that was requested many times, Disqus. You’ll be able to block trolls and have the comment features you want.

If you have any issues signing up for Disqus, email [email protected].

Thank you for being loyal readers of HotAir, we love you all.
